name: The Magi
flavorText: It is believed the magi, practitioners of strange and esoteric magics, died out long ago. The only proofs of their existence are the Behistun tomes and this staff.
flavorTextHtml: It is believed the magi, practitioners of strange and esoteric magics, died out long ago. The only proofs of their existence are the Behistun tomes and this staff.

secondary.textHtml: Reduces duration of control impairing effects by [7 - 12]%
